synopsis.text: Orgel, the endearing android, notices a change in her beloved Keiichiro's demeanor as he appears weary and drained. In an effort to lift his spirits, she embarks on a culinary adventure, despite her lack of experience in the kitchen. This heartwarming extra episode of "Kowarekake no Orgel" follows Orgel's determined journey from the grocery store to the kitchen, all in the hope of rejuvenating Keiichiro's spirit with a delicious meal. Will Orgel's well-intentioned surprise bring the desired smile to Keiichiro's face? Join Orgel and Keiichiro in this delightful exploration of love, care, and the art of cooking.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
